pullRequest.title: [launcher] The launcher will now be registered as soon as possible
pullRequest.bodyText:
The serviceregistration of the launcher is currently the only way, to retrieve the launcher arguments in the Framework. Especially for a lot of the Eclipse Bundles, it is necessary to have this information as early as possible. Thus the launcher needs to be registered right after the framework is started and not after all is done..
Signed-off-by: Juergen Albert j.albert@data-in-motion.biz

nodes.bodyText: This should not be an instance variable. You should not reuse the Hashtable across service calls. Create a new Hashtable and populated it at each place you make a service call.
